text: 21.4 Ais 25.8, 35.10, 61.3, 65.19, 1 Ko 15.26, 15.54, Lep 7.17, 20.14 Tap ned nɨb adek ak ke yelɨgɨpal, mɨñɨl ak pen ke yɨbɨl yenɨgabal agak. God kɨlop kod mɨdɨl, chaŋ ñɨg kɨlop ak mɨdupsek wik yokɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb olap ma kumnɨgabal, mɨŋel ma dɨnɨgab, chaŋ ma lɨnɨgabal, yul ma dɨnɨgab agak.
